title: Ribble Ultra SL may be most advanced aero road bike, thanks to its wild curvy bar!
content:
Ribble’s all-new Ultra SL aero road bike strikes a familiar aerodynamic profile overall, before making lofty claims based on its unique development and integration. Is this the new Ultra the most aerodynamically advanced road bike ever? Ribble seems to think so, and it’s certainly their fastest road bike yet. And much of the secret is […]

The post Ribble Ultra SL may be most advanced aero road bike, thanks to its wild curvy bar! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
